title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: LOT 1: Kialara Silver Series 2018 'Hydra' Set #69https://kialara.com/product/silver-series-2018-hydra/LOT 2: Kialara Silver Series 2017 'To The Moon' Set #42https://kialara.com/product/silver-series-2017-moon/*Each bar will come with original bag, red velvet pouch, and plastic caseSTARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0400BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0005BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: AUGUST 19th, 2022, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOTIf within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made PER LOT, 5 minutes will be added to the that lot from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference

comments.author: CoinageMint
comments.body: Is lot 1 the diamond and emerald set?

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: Quote from: CoinageMint on August 15, 2022, 05:16:59 AMIs lot 1 the diamond and emerald set?yes, it is

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: Since2010 on August 17, 2022, 08:21:24 PMLot 1: 0.1BTCQuote from: 123Dave on August 17, 2022, 06:54:10 PMLot 2 .045 BTC Current high bidsEnds tomorrow afternoon

comments.author: CoinageMint
comments.body: I have always wanted to add a Kialara to my collection, I especially like these pieces with the precious stones but if buying would want a good color Dies the emerald have much color to it, And if so can you post a new pic?(I really should have asked for that earlier)

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: Quote from: CoinageMint on August 19, 2022, 04:43:58 AMI have always wanted to add a Kialara to my collection, I especially like these pieces with the precious stones but if buying would want a good color Dies the emerald have much color to it, And if so can you post a new pic?(I really should have asked for that earlier)you can see the best pictures of the Kialaras auctioned here on the official homepage posted by minerjones:Quote from: minerjones on August 14, 2022, 03:28:12 PMLOT 1: Kialara Silver Series 2018 'Hydra' Set #69https://kialara.com/product/silver-series-2018-hydra/LOT 2: Kialara Silver Series 2017 'To The Moon' Set #42https://kialara.com/product/silver-series-2017-moon/✂

comments.body: Quote from: cygan on August 19, 2022, 06:24:14 AMQuote from: CoinageMint on August 19, 2022, 04:43:58 AMI have always wanted to add a Kialara to my collection, I especially like these pieces with the precious stones but if buying would want a good color Dies the emerald have much color to it, And if so can you post a new pic?(I really should have asked for that earlier)you can see the best pictures of the Kialaras auctioned here on the official homepage posted by minerjones:Quote from: minerjones on August 14, 2022, 03:28:12 PMLOT 1: Kialara Silver Series 2018 'Hydra' Set #69https://kialara.com/product/silver-series-2018-hydra/LOT 2: Kialara Silver Series 2017 'To The Moon' Set #42https://kialara.com/product/silver-series-2017-moon/✂Thanks, I've looked at those pics plenty of times, believe me  Maybe it's just the pic above, but the emerald doesn't look like the best color, I can't see that beautiful emerald green

Last one is out of focus, but shows some good color!!
